评论详情: Compliments from the moment I stepped into the room. I love this dress and color.

This dress was very festive,  perfect for the event I bought it for.  It was comfortable and seemed pretty well made.  The front tended to gap open when seated,  but that was easily fixed with a tiny pin.
Ended up returning this because the sequins made me itch.  Also it had someone else's perfume on it.
Fit was great. Great quality.
Material is scratchy. Needs better lining inside!

I am a dark purple fiend and this purple was the perfect shade! I wore it to a holiday party and people called me the sparkle princess. It’s very flattering and the sequins look nice and not cheap. It did get a little bit itchy around the arm holes but nowhere near as bad as other sequined dresses I’ve worn. I washed it inside out in a lingerie bag on the delicate cycle and I didn’t see any sequins in the bag and I hung it to dry and it looks great still. I think one do the best things was that I didn’t have to pin it across my chest. Usually with dresses like this the top gaps too much and I have to pin it but this one was perfect.

评论概述: The dress is pretty, but the sizing is off.
评论详情: The dress was gogerous, but the sizing was off. The medium was very baggy and kept slipping off my shoulders, I ended up picking another dress to wear to my event.

Dress is really pretty but has an area on the bottom of the back around an inch squared that has no sequins, hoping no one notices as there isn't enough time to get another one shipped before this needs to be worn.
I no longer need this dress. It has not been worn and tag  is still on the dress. I found a dress that fits better than this one.

评论概述: Cute, but shed sequins all over the place

Loved the dress ,the color, the look, the fabric the fit and the style, she did say under the arms was a little scretchy. It also was delivered fast.
Sparkly beautiful I bought it for an F Scott Fitzgerald Gatsby party and it was the coolest outfit there!  Lucky me!
This dress fits and looks great
I bought this dress for an upcoming gala, I also bought it in purple because I can’t decide what color I want to wear. Really pretty dress

This is a very pretty dress and was true to size. I think it is more pink than gold and it's even more pink in person than in the photos I've attached. It is pink sequins on pink material and nothing gold about it which is why I gave it 4 stars. I believe they have upgraded the design to include a tulle material around the arm holes so there is no issue with the sequins rubbing as others have commented. I liked the front of the dress very much, but felt the back of the dress was very straight and flat without any pleats or gathering and I just didn't like that so I will be returning it.
Suitable for pretty much everyone and very flattering to most shapes. surprisingly good quality for the price. sequins seem to be secure.

I ordered the medium and it was too small.  The large was too big.  The dress is gorgeous and very well made.  Has a nice fullness to it, lightweight and won’t wrinkle.  Very flattering.  I needed to return them because the alteration cost would have been more than the dress.  Also not a fan of scratchy sequins under my arms.  My arms were red just from trying it on. Can’t imagine wearing it all night without a cardigan.
this dress was so cute and comfortable. great buy for the money
Awesome true to size

I wore this to sing a concert with my jazz band and I think I got as many compliments on it as I got on my singing. It looks fabulous and flows so prettily.  Love it and look forward to wearing it again soon.

Wore this to last year's Christmas party for my job. It was SOOO comfortable! It draped beautifully and fit exactly to size. Would definitely recommend this for us plus sized girls! (I wear a size 14/16.) Flatters the figure nicely!
Very poor quality. After wearing it just once the sequins are falling everywhere and a seam has opened... Unfortunately too late to return it :( Don't buy, it's just a waste of money.
Bought this dress for my daughter to wear in my wedding, it's beautiful and she looks absolutely gorgeous in it, my baby may outshine the bride (me), but that's o.k.
Fit great. Got tons of compliments. I found matching sequin shoes on Amazon. I bought a navy blue crinoline that poofs out the skirt.
My daughter wore it in the 4 of july parade. She looked amazing. Great fit. Great quality

I looked for forever to find a dress, I ordered from so many places and anything that said ‘sequins’ was in fact not sequins. BUT this dress was! And it was lovely! Only complaint is that it scratches under the arms, but that’s to be expected with a sequin dress

I love this dress! I’ve worn it three times now! First time was for a friends 60th birthday party at a disco and the last time I wore it was to see Donny Osmond and he commented that he liked my dress!  Haven’t washed it yet as I haven’t gotten it dirty but it wears comfortably and it’s a stunning dress

评论概述: Not the best for special occasions
评论详情: I got this for prom, but once I tried it on, it didn’t look right. I felt like I was supposed to be in princess and the popstar Barbie movie. I guess if you’re a little kid, but for me trying to go to prom I felt really embarrassed that I got this. But I mean, if it wasn’t for prom it’s a nice dress to have fun and what not but yeah I don’t really recommend
The quality and design are better than the website description. I wore it for my concert and it was comfortable and beautiful.

I bought this for a dance and it was so fun to dance and twirl in. Only bad side was the sequins rub under the armpits and I wound up with irritated/microsliced skin. I received tons of compliments on the dress and it feels really lightweight.

This dress was beautiful! Just as shown in the photo. The fit was exactly as the size chart indicates. The fabric had a little stretch, but not a lot. The coverage was good- not too revealing in the chest, and the length was short enough to be fun, but still appropriate for a conservative person. The sequins were multi-colored and flat to the dress and looked great. However, the person this was purchased for is extremely sensitive and did not like the way they felt, so I had to return this. Overall, this dress is a great option, and a good value for the cost, but sequins can be a risk for a hypersensitive person.

I am going to a family wedding and bought another dress, well it’s nice but I would have to altered. I recently saw this dress and I bought five different colors. When I received them I was blown over how gorgeous they are, so comfortable, I had a hard time picking what color. I stayed with the dark blue and I’m so happy. Love, love, love these dresses.
Loved it so much I bought a second in a different color!
this fit good but after wearing the front didn’t stay closed and the sequins scraped up my arms
I loved wearing this dress! It fit, was beautiful and comfortable. I’m 5’3” busty and weigh about 150 and the medium was perfect.

Bought for my Daughter-in-law and it just needed a pin or stitch at the neckline. Great fit with a tad of stretch. Lays pretty over the hips. Runs true to size but would recommend sizing up one size if your busty. I put a couple of small stitches on the top to keep it closed. Because it is a surplus style top/neckline… it will show too much if your big busted. I naught it in green sequins color. It sparkles and looks nice for a simi formal event. She also paired it with a short black sweater and plans on wearing it to her work Christmas party.

评论概述: This was Perfect for News Year Eve!

I bought this online for my little brother’s disco themed wedding! It is just as it looks, and the fit was perfect (following the size guide). It is well-made and high quality! Not a single sequence out of place by the end of a night of dancing! My only complaint is that it was rough on the insides of my arms to rub on my sides all night… but it wasn’t horrible. Now I’m searching for another excuse to wear it!
my grand daughters 15 th birthday party she loved it
This dress is so pretty! I bought a medium and it fits perfectly. The sequins are a little scratchy around the arm area but it won’t prevent me from wearing it. The color is just absolutely gorgeous!

Cheap cheap cheap!

Paired it with a black slip for volume. I am 5'4 height. 36H/46inch bust, 34inch waist. I purchased a size XL. Careful when using the zipper. It is not of highest quality and will easily snag on the sequins.
I wore this to a banquet and am wearing it to a wedding later this month. I rocked the banquet in this hot dress! Super impressed. Fit perfect and looked amazing. Super classy!!

I have the blue sequin. It’s very comfortable and very flattering.  I’m 5’ 9” and weigh 180.  It covers my belly fat. Bought it for a wedding.  I was going to buy another one but the price increased $20.  I won’t pay $55.

I bought this for my college graduation. It’s beautiful and the length was great, however, this dress is not for small chested women. I have barely B cups and the chest area was SO baggy on me, I’m not even sure getting it tailored would have helped.

评论详情: This was my birthday dress. It was perfect. The right color, fit very well, I looked beautiful, got lots of compliments. And I am very, very happy with my purchase.

Dress comes exactly as appears. I am on the bigger side and it sat really well on me. The sequins do come all the way up to the arm pit so be warned it's not going to be incredibly comfortable. You'll be looking good, but a bit uncomfortable
Nice quality

I bought this for an upcoming cruise. Every girl needs a sparkle dress somtime in life lol It fits like a glove! I am glad I went with the small. If you are bigger then a 32 C I would go with the medium. It's not to lowcut and it is below the knees a bit. The A line is perfect for my body as I am curvey on the bottem but smaller up top. This dress is beautiful! I bought the blue/ green looks elegant.

This dress is even more beautiful in person! Love how it fits and it is going to be perfect for mermaid celebrations this month.

I got the rainbow one for a dance with the hubby and I loved it! I’m 5’8 175 pounds and went with the xl. I had extra room and could have maybe done a large instead but I prefer a looser fit. Paired it with a hot pink petticoat (Shimaly® Women's 50s Vintage Petticoat 26" Crinoline Rockabilly Tutu Skirt Slip S-3XL) and the length was perfect! I did buy shapewear to wear underneath but because of the fit I ended up not needing it. Wearing again for another dance shortly!
Love the shimmer but it’s surprisingly comfortable. Only thing missing is pockets
I absolutely loved this dress and it was comfortable and fit well! I am normally an XL 16/18 and an XL in the dress fit perfectly!

评论概述: Great party dress and got lots of compliments
评论详情: Great affordable party dress. Not superior quality but good quality. Fabric is a bit sheer but I bought the black dress and it wasn’t an issue. Also, the material is a bit stretchy and I could’ve bought a smaller size.

I loved this dress. I am almost 6ft tall and this dress was the PERFECT length for me. I bought a size bigger than I should have, but it all worked out in the end.  It looked so great for the tribute show we did. The lights hit it just right. I will be wearing this dress with these boots every chance I get.  I will say that sequence is rough on the bottom of your arms if you’ve got biggen’s like I’ve got. But it was comfortable in the long run. My butt did not show and that was a major PLUS!!!
Bought for NYE. Was very pleased with fit. Better than expected quality for the price. Cheers!
Needed a dress for a evening out this is perfect the chest area is just right, looks fancy
Fits well and looks great!

When I washed this (delicate cycle, cold water, in a garment bag, as directed), it came out with a very odd issue. I expected to lose a sequin here or there, and did. No biggie. But the dress is now SHEDDING these tiny black bits of what resemble eraser shavings. When the dress moves, it sheds. Wet or dry. Even after I used a lint roller to remove whatever it is that’s sloughing off. It’s exceedingly puzzling, and I’m not sure if I’ll wear it if this persists. But it does fit beautifully, perfect swing in the skirt, and the iridescent look of the sequins is mesmerizing! If you do opt to buy this, I think I’d recommend dry cleaning or hand washing. It seems too fragile for regular washing even on Delicate.

评论概述: This dress is sparkly and flattering.
评论详情: This is an awesome, super sparkly, great color dress. Very flattering and comfortable. It has good edging around the neck and arm holes, so the sequin don't scratch. I didn't have trouble with the sides scratching my arms either. For reference, I am 5'5" and 115 lbs, and I ordered a size small. This is NOT one of the Amazon items that you need to order a size up. I wouldn't have wanted it any larger. I saw that several people wore it with a petticoat, and that would be a great addition, but I didn't have one the right length. I definitely recommend it!

I wore this dress for New Years Eve and I received a lot of compliments, had one say I reminded her of Marilyn Manroe. It has some stretch in it, was flowy and comfortable. I didn't itch from the sequins at all, not even under my arms. I would definitely recommend this dress.

I do think after a while it might irritate my arms so I will bring a cardigan just in case, hence the 4 not 5 stars so far. I will say it's very sheer, but I think the sequins help to disguise that. Although I haven't worn this dress in public yet, it fit perfectly and felt very comfortable. I thought the sequins might be scratchy on my skin but they are very smooth. My only concern is that it seems a little more sheer than I like.

This dress is so much fun and I received a million compliments from young adults to sixtylicious people like me. It was comfortable. Looked great and was such a great value. It's a classic, fun, amazing dress.  True to size. I LOVE IT!

评论概述: Very pretty but smallest size too big for a normal size lady
评论详情: I am 5'4", pretty athletic with measurements 37" x 28" x 40" at 130 lbs.VERY nice dress, felt wonderful, so comfortable and very pretty.  If I was using it for something casual it might have been okay but sequence isn't usually casual and it was way too lose everywhere to be okay for a more dressy event.  I bought the small, which was the smallest size available.  The waist and bust was too small.  This would probably be a great dress for someone a little bigger and in particular if you wanted something conservative for a large chest.

Fits well, but needed professional alteration to raise the length. Also, unless you are busty, the top V-Neck sags into your cleavage. I added a bra with a horizontal middle piece, so it filled that gap and worked. All in all, the quality looks better than the cost, and is worth having to make minor alterations and take care when washing. Sequins are festive and it washes well when put inside a large size zippered flow through laundry bag in the washer.
Pretty dress, but returned it because the sequins were falling off, still finding them in my carpet
Beautiful Color wished it was shorter and actual size.  A small is really a medium women.  Bummer that there it doesn't come in XS

评论概述: Perfect for a glam night in New Orleans
评论详情: I bought several dresses to try for an anniversary trip to New Orleans, and the second I tried this one on, I knew it was the one. I love how sparkly the sequins are, and the purple color is so deep and gorgeous.  The fit was spot on; I didn't feel like it was too loose or tight anywhere, and it was super comfortable. Sometimes dresses in this style this have a higher waist, which makes me feel like it's a maternity dress, but not this one. I'm 6', and dress length is often an issue for me, but this wasn't too long or short. The whole thing fit perfectly!
Beautiful dress. The color was nice and vibrant,  love the fit and flare. Great compliments.

My 1 year old daughter wore this dress to her first HS Homecoming. It shines great and looked great. It fit her great. Not to low in the neck, or anything. She looked awesome in it. I highly recommend this dress. Not to revealing like a lot of the homecoming dresses out there now days.

I enjoy that the dress is comfortable, Great quality material. The color of the dress is true to the picture. Fits true to size. The only thing I dislike about the dress is at times the sequins can hurt.
Wonderful dress for homecoming.
